QuestData.Title: The Gordunni Orb
QuestData.Description: While you're down there cracking skulls...$B$BI've gotten reports that make me think these ogres may be more than the usual lumbering threat. The Warlocks among them have been seen carrying orbs, possibly items of empowerment.$B$BIt would be easy to dismiss them as crude trinkets, but I need to make sure we're not surprised. Bring me back one of these orbs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Gordunni Orb from a Gordunni Warlock.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. Let me have a look at this.
